attributes.action: Make those who want Brexit pay for it.
attributes.background: The Chancellor of the Exchequer should introduce tax measures in the next budget to ensure that those who campaigned for and/or voted for the UK to leave the EU should pay any net cost arising from Brexit. The funds raised should be Spent on the NHS.

rejection.details: Voting in UK elections and referendums is anonymous, so we're not sure how you would like the Government to identify people who should pay this additional tax.
